# Documentation Skill

Comprehensive documentation system based on production best practices.

## Commands

| Command | Description |
|---------|-------------|
| `/docs init` | Initialize full docs structure |
| `/docs new [type]` | Create new document |
| `/docs status` | Show documentation status |
| `/docs validate` | Validate all headers |

## Folder Structure

See `templates/STRUCTURE.md` for complete structure.

## Standards

See `standards/` folder for all standards.
